name: Sky Jump (itch) (jeremyb)
description:
Sky Jump is an "infinite faller" game created with my family for the Game Off 2022 game jam.

The game jam theme is "cliche" and Sky Jump was based on the cliche phrase, "If all your friends jumped off a cliff, would you jump too?"

Move the character Left and Right to avoid the rocks, rescue your friends, and collect items. Try to get a high score by collecting as many friends and items as you can!

We plan to continue working on the game after the jam is complete, adding more characters, items, and levels as you fall deeper into the chasm.
